comment: * This class specifies the set of parameters used with password-based * encryption (PBE), as defined in the * PKCS #5 * standard. * * @author Jan Luehe * * @since 1.4

methods.name: public byte[] getSalt()
methods.comment:
* Returns the salt.
     *
     * @return the salt. Returns a new array
     * each time this method is called.

methods.name: public int getIterationCount()
methods.comment:
* Returns the iteration count.
     *
     * @return the iteration count

methods.name: public AlgorithmParameterSpec getParameterSpec()
methods.comment:
* Returns the cipher algorithm parameter specification.
     *
     * @return the parameter specification, or null if none was set.
     *
     * @since 1.8
